headline: Harris Unveiled Her Economic Agenda
description: In her first major policy speech since launching her campaign for president, Kamala Harris explained the core of her economic agenda, promising to fight big corporations and bring down costs, with a new federal ban on price gouging on groceries as a centerpiece.
newsletter_sub_hed: Also, Russia closed in on a key city in eastern Ukraine. Here’s the latest at the end of Friday.

headline: Russia closed in on a key city in eastern Ukraine
description: Russian troops are advancing toward the eastern Ukrainian town of Pokrovsk, bringing Russia closer to seizing the entire Donetsk region.
newsletter_sub_hed: Also, Russia closed in on a key city in eastern Ukraine. Here’s the latest at the end of Friday.

headline: Mediators raced to bridge gaps between Israel and Hamas
description: High-level negotiations to halt the war in Gaza ended without a breakthrough, but mediators from the U.S., Egypt, and Qatar will continue efforts next week amid concerns of Iranian retaliation.
newsletter_sub_hed: Also, Russia closed in on a key city in eastern Ukraine. Here’s the latest at the end of Friday.

headline: The real estate industry is about to change
description: Starting tomorrow, real estate agents must adopt new practices that could radically lower the commissions they get from buyers and sellers during a home sale.
